channel.description: Recent content in misc on Davidonium Tech Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: About me Don’t much to say here. I am a software engineer based in barcelona who loves reading all kinds of text: fantasy novels, tech articles, tech books, reddit posts on /r/programming, everything on hackernews… My love for computers started early in my life when I tinkered with a green phosphor screen computer, which brand I no longer remember. As I grew up there was always a computer at home to learn new things, the internet and all that.
